name: XMLUnit 2.x
body:
### Welcome to XMLUnit's new Home

The development of XMLUnit 2.x - both for Java and .NET is in the process of moving to github.

XMLUnit for Java 1.x still has its home at [sourceforge](http://xmlunit.sourceforge.net/), if you want to report bugs, please use the issue tracker [over there](http://sourceforge.net/p/xmlunit/bugs/?source=navbar) - feature request should go against the 2.x version here.

Currently the code lives in https://github.com/xmlunit/xmlunit - a single repository that shares the code for Java and .NET, the user's guide will be created inside a [github wiki](https://github.com/xmlunit/user-guide/wiki).

Right now the focus is on migrating content and creating a viable roadmap towards the first release of XMLUnit 2.0.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
